Description: Picking MO -  1. Add "picked by" field in MRU2 and MRU3 2. Create report funct. in MRU3 that 1 picker picked all components.  3. Create reporting funct. in MRU2 who picked each row.
Justification: Decision Supporting. WH will be able to trace picking productivity of employees. Operators are today being tracked based on the production productivity but not MO pickers.

Description: (CUBE) Performance indicator MO- We need these fields, Mo number, jeeves number, description, qty, item group, flow group, manufacturing group, mo/works orders status, created date, start date, ready date, inbound date, gross purch price curr, unit time. Per week or per week statistics when necessary.
Justification: With the new ISO version that we want to get it – it will be necessary for each processus described to get a performance indicator.   This should already exist

Description: We have decided to reduce the quantity of acquisition methods in Sundsvalls jeeves as a preparation for going over to One Jeeves.To do this we will have to change the acquisition method on some items. I have created a list with 2900 items where this needs to be changed.To do this we will have to change the acquisition method on some items. I have created a list with 2900 items where this needs to be changed.On the list you can see the metod that is current and the one it should be changed into. I have marked the column in yellow that it should be changed to.
Justification: It will help us clean up the system in preparation for one jeeves.

Description: Automatic information about the change of the planning of the MO to the customer officer of the linked order / if any change is made after the order had been confirmed to the customer Change of e.g ready date.
Justification: Improvement of communication with the customers and between departments.

Description: China factory sales calculation to be done on PC5 and not BC sales
Justification: Calculation in SZV is not ok according to the BC model set by the Group

Description: New value calculate in field MOQ
Justification: Costs and logistics process optimization. Due to change of items assembly and settings we need to change all the data in operations and logistics data.

Description: At present Gliwice factory use quality blocked inventory batch  for products which are stored outside Gliwice factory. By blocking goods on separate batch system generate requisitions and orders as a goods needs to be produce or ordered. We need new status for example external warehouse thanks which system will be aware that new manufacture or purchase orders are not needed.
Justification: Thanks that feature we will improve time for manufacturing and purchasing orders cancellation, eliminate mistakes made by manual management. This functionality can be used within all factories and hubs .
Constant problems, we need a more stable solution

Description: We have a lot of our customers requesting additional labeling on the products they are buying from us.  Tesco and SES are close examples. To be able to handle this, we need a possibility to design and print out customer designed labels. The printouts needs to be connected to items or orders in Jeeves to have an automated process to get the print-out for customer labels together with normal production labels.
Justification: •	Increasing customer demand for special designed labels, especially from large customers •	Help us in the work to get “easy to do business with” •	Higher quality due to an automated process. •	Less administration

Description: Creation a new table in Jeeves with questionnaire about setup parameters for Injection Moulding MO’s. Table should be available in JeevesReplication database with possible to make queries. Please also add in XTI program field “IM weight” with average weight from last questionnaire for MO row (info about average below).
Justification: Collecting all information in one system (Jeeves).  Database to analyze real system parameters and future updates on items.

Description: Block the possibility to log in by users or pick material on MO that are not planned yet
Justification: Avoid mistakes during production and planning.

Description: We would like to have some kind of warning when creating items. We have some problems now and then when item is created and creator is missing to put bin location in system or run calculation before addressing bin location resulting in huge errors on current cost price
Justification: The error is causing problems with wrong stock value and also gross margin will be totally wrong.
